sn2.14:1: Standing to one side, the young deva Nandana addressed the Blessed One in verse:
sn2.14:2: v.95"I ask you, Gotama, broad of wisdom—Unobstructed is the Blessed One's knowledge and vision:
sn2.14:3: v.296"One virtuous, wise, of developed mind,Concentrated, mindful, enjoying jhāna,For whom all sorrows are gone, abandoned,A taint-destroyer bearing his final body:
sn2.14:4: v.297It is such a one that they call virtuous,Such a one that they call wise,Such a one has passed beyond suffering,Such a one the devatas worship."
